secureinclude-desc:
Include local, remote files via tag <include>. Use tags <shell> and <php> to execute the respective code in the page context.
  • include svncat, local files or urls
  • postprocess the output as wikitext
  • syntax highlighting via SyntaxHighlight extension
  • control caching, escaping, nowiki and more
heavily based on based on the original Include extension https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Include
